div.h2: Line Berenson-Eggers Type of Service (BETOS) Code

div.p: The Berenson-Eggers type of service (BETOS) for the procedure code based on generally agreed upon clinically meaningful groupings of procedures and services. This field is included as a line item on the non-institutional claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/betos_cd
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

name.value: Line Berenson-Eggers Type of Service (BETOS) Code

description.value: The Berenson-Eggers type of service (BETOS) for the procedure code based on generally agreed upon clinically meaningful groupings of procedures and services. This field is included as a line item on the non-institutional claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/betos_cd
